creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: triangular-shaped pouch in bright multicolors; embroidered overall, predominately in white, with organic designs embellished with mirrors and gold beads; similar embroidery styles on front and back; beads and multicolored yarn tassels on two sides; lined with purple; pouch buttons onto flat ornament of joined teardrop and diamond shapes in same embroidery motifs and with similar tassels and beading; ornament backed with purple printed fabric
title: Pouch with ornament
